subject: Soccer
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Sunil Gulati and Michael Garcia lobbied for the public release of an investigative report into the awarding of the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
snippet: Sunil Gulati and Michael Garcia lobbied for the public release of an investigative report into the awarding of the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
